APP_YOU_HAVE_A_NEW_MESSAGE_FROM_{USERNAM: You Have A New Message From {username}
API_MOBILE_FRIENDLY_AND_CONVERSION_OPTIM: Collect any information through your own flow and let Stripe take care of the rest through its mobile friendly and conversion-optimized UI.
API_DRIVE_REVENUE_FOR_YOUR_BUSINESS: Drive revenue for your business by collecting fees for your services.
API_ROUTE_FUNDS_TO_YOUR_RECIPIENTS: Route funds to your recipients’ bank accounts and debit card flexibly and programmatically.
API_CONNECT_FLEXIBLE_SET_OF_FEATURES_INC: Connect’s flexible set of features includes:
API_THE_ROUTING_NUMBER: The routing number, sort code, or other country-appropriate institution number for the bank account. For US bank accounts, this is required and should be the ACH routing number, not the wire routing number. If you are providing an IBAN for account_number, this field is not required.
API_THE_BANK_ACCOUNT_NUMBER: The account number for the bank account, in string form. Must be a checking account.
API_THE_NAME_OF_THE_PERSON_OR_BUSINESS_T: The name of the person or business that owns the bank account. This field is required when attaching the bank account to a Customer object.
API_THE_MERCHANT_CATEGORY_CODE: The merchant category code for the account. MCCs are used to classify businesses based on the goods or services they provide.
API_WHETHER_THE_PERSON_IS_AN_OWNER_OF_TH: Whether the person is an owner of the account’s legal entity.
API_THE_PERSON_TITLE: The person’s title (e.g., CEO, Support Engineer).
API_THE_RELATIONSHIP_PERSON_SOCIAL_SECUR: The relationship person’s social security number.
API_THE_BUSINESS_ID_NUMBER: The business ID number of the company, as appropriate for the company’s country. (Examples are an Employer ID Number in the U.S., a Business Number in Canada, or a Company Number in the UK.)
API_THE_COMPANY_PHONE_NUMBER: The company’s phone number (used for verification).
API_THE_DAY_OF_BIRTH_BETWEEN_1_AND_31: The day of birth, between 1 and 31.
API_THE_MONTH_OF_BIRTH_BETWEEN_1_AND_12: The month of birth, between 1 and 12.
API_THE_GOVERNMENT_ISSUED_ID_NUMBER: The government-issued ID number of the individual, as appropriate for the representative’s country. (Examples are a Social Security Number in the U.S., or a Social Insurance Number in Canada).
API_CITY_DISTRICT_SUBURB_TOWN_OR_VILLAGE: City, district, suburb, town, or village.
API_ADDRESS_LINE_2: Address line 2 (e.g., apartment, suite, unit, or building).
API_ADDRESS_LINE_1: Address line 1 (e.g., street, PO Box, or company name).
API_A_PUBLICLY_AVAILABLE_EMAIL_ADDRESS_F: A publicly available email address for sending support issues to.
API_A_PUBLICLY_AVAILABLE_PHONE_NUMBER_TO: A publicly available phone number to call with support issues.
API_A_PUBLICLY_AVAILABLE_WEBSITE_FOR_HAN: A publicly available website for handling support issues.
APP_REWARDS_{REWARDPOINTS}_HAS_BEEN_{DEB: Reward points {rewardpoints} has been {debitcredittype} to your account
APP_STATUS_FOR_CANCELLATION_{INVOICENUMB: Status for order cancellation invoice {invoicenumber} has been updated to {requeststatus}
APP_NEW_MESSAGE_POSTED_BY_{USERNAME}_ON_: New message posted by {username} on return request {requestnumber}
APP_RETURN_FOR_{RETURNPRODTITLE}_WITH_{R: Return request for {returnprodtitle} with reference number {returnrequestid} is successfully submitted.
APP_AMOUNT_{REQUESTAMOUNT}_WITH_{REQUEST: Withdrawal Amount {requestamount} with request id {requestid} has been {requeststatus}
APP_AMOUNT_{TXNAMOUNT}_WITH_{TXNID}_HAS_: Amount {txnamount} with transaction id {txnid} has been {txntype} to your account
APP_YOUR_ORDER_{INVOICE}_{PRODUCT}_STATU: Status for {PRODUCT} with invoice {INVOICE} has been updated to {STATUS}
APP_PAYMENT_STATUS_FOR_ORDER_{ORDERID}_U: Payment status for order {ORDERID} has been updated to {STATUS}
APP_YOUR_ORDER_{ORDERID}_HAVE_BEEN_PLACE: Thank you for placing order {ORDERID}. Visit my order section for updates.
APP_THANK_YOU_FOR_ACCOUNT_VERIFICATION: Thank you for verifying your account.
APP_VERIFY_YOUR_ACCCOUNT_FROM_REGISTERED: Please verify your account from your registered emailLogo.
